Name: Battle Cat vs Treacherous Mice
About the game: Battle Cat vs Treacherous Mice - a game in which you shoot dangerous creatures on the surface under the control of treacherous mice. Mice sit underground and cause a lot of trouble. Your task is to complete all the levels and clear the surface of pests. Features of the game: Endless rounds of ammo! Treacherous mice! Achievements for completing levels! Teleports! Doors! Milk - YES, milk is a first-aid kit! Jumping off the walls! Complex mechanisms with saws!
